name: Gravity Outlaw
description:
Hi! This is my first game.

It’s a simple puzzle platformer, you can move around, push objects, fall, and die (in game, of course).

The twist, though: The gravity will flip itself every 3 seconds. This mechanic developed several interesting levels!

Definitely try it out if you have some spare time!

As it is my first game, there should be some bugs contained within it, or it can also be something you simply don’t like. Please leave me a comment or a feedback here [https://chronoaero.github.io?id=9fda14d4-9d70-428e-9414-e5af537ae5ce] (if you want to be more private).

Your feedback will help me progress forward, and perhaps I’ll make some more enjoyable games for you to play in the future.
